title: Life of Jane Welsh Carlyle,
author: Ireland, Annie Elizabeth (Nicholson)
snippet: a bitterness of sorrow as I hardly recollect otherwise, ' and engaged  him with Irving in a mad sort of enterprise to intercept in a yawl from Kirkcaldy Sands ' the outward bound big ship ' in which Mrs. Glen and her husband were sailing forth on their Astrachan missionary enterprise.
